mapper.select: select a1.[ApplicationNO] as id , pm.[ProductName] as productName , fi.[CarBrand1] as carBrandId , vc.[CodeFullName] as carDetail, ci.[CustomerName] as custName, ci.[CustomerIDNO] as custIdNo, a1.[CreateTeamID] as jxsId, fi.[LoanAmount1] as rzje, fi.[MonthlyPayAmount1] as ygk, fi.[GPSFee1] as gpsfee1, fi.[PurchaseTax1] as gzs1, fi.[ServiceFee1] as fwf1, fi.[FinancingPeriods1] as rzqs1, pm1.[HandlingCharge] as rate, fi.[MortgageRate1] sfbl, dd1.[Value] as sqdzt , dd2.[Value] as hyzk, a1.[SubmitDate] as submitDate FROM [AP].[ApplicationForm] a1 LEFT JOIN BS.[ProductMaster] pm on a1.[ProductID] = pm.[ProductID] LEFT JOIN BS.[ProductMaster] pm1 on pm.[ParentID] =pm1.[ProductID] LEFT JOIN [AP].[CustomerInfo] ci on a1.[ApplicationNO] = ci.[ApplicationNO] LEFT JOIN [AP].[FinanceInfo] fi on a1.[ApplicationNO] = fi.[ApplicationNO] LEFT JOIN [BS].[VehicleConfiguration] vc on fi.[CarBrand1] = vc.[Code] LEFT JOIN [BS].[DataDictionaryDetail] dd1 on a1.[Status] =dd1.[ItemID] LEFT JOIN [BS].[DataDictionaryDetail] dd2 on ci.[CustomerMarriageStatus] =dd2.[ItemID] where CONVERT (VARCHAR (10), a1.[SubmitDate] ,120) =#{sqfqrq}

SELECT t1.[ApplicationNO] appid, t5.CustomerName name, ISNULL(t2.Amount,0) fx, ISNULL(t3.Amount,0) lx, ISNULL(t4.Amount,0) bj, ISNULL(t1.TotalAmount,0) total, t1.RemnantPrincipal sybj FROM RP.GeneralAccount t1 LEFT JOIN RP.GeneralAccountDetail t2 ON t2.ApplicationNO = t1.ApplicationNO AND t2.ItemID=3 LEFT JOIN RP.GeneralAccountDetail t3 ON t3.ApplicationNO = t1.ApplicationNO AND t3.ItemID=5 LEFT JOIN RP.GeneralAccountDetail t4 ON t4.ApplicationNO = t1.ApplicationNO AND t4.ItemID=6 INNER JOIN dbo.V_AP_ApplicationForm t5 ON t5.ApplicationNO = t1.ApplicationNO WHERE t1.TotalAmount>0
